channel.title: Bandos chestplate! (new god amrour in client)!
channel.description:
[img]http://img114.imageshack.us/img114/1272/bandosmo9.png[/img]
the problem is...
It appears by my feet - what do i do to make it appear on my chest?

item.title: Bandos chestplate! (new god amrour in client)!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

you probly shouldnt do it in such a moronic way. leave it too rune server to release a method for morons. they couldnt evan do a built in java gzip method lul, have fun with your java heaps sense your not using the method the client uses to cache the information it allready loaded which means if you spawn enough items all their definitions sense you hardcoded will be loaded over and over and over and over again

item.title: Bandos chestplate! (new god amrour in client)!
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:8, topic:138999”][quote author=Itachi Uchiha link=topic=190964.msg1719669#msg1719669 date=1188608749]

[quote author=rs w00dcut link=topic=190964.msg1719664#msg1719664 date=1188608611]

[quote author=tedyslilnoob link=topic=190964.msg1719662#msg1719662 date=1188608541]
rofl you think im that stupid. It appears in chest area… It jsut appears on feet when i equip. and when i walk it slides with feet.
[/quote]Maybe you have the id in boots…check
[/quote]No shut up already, you have no idea of what he is even talking about.
[/quote]I tried to help so u need to stfu…
Wheres ur help? do u know what hes talking about?
wheres your post for helping him? all your doing is flaming me…oh yeah spam also…[/quote]First off you don’t even know what is going on here, all item.java in those statics does is put the item in a different item slot it DOES NOT change where the item is located, he is talking about client side you are talking about server side.

Read full topic
